document.title: A R K A N S A S F I N E A R T S ACADEMIC STANDARDS 2020 MUSIC

B62C4BBF6FD14FB0B8695329BC086544.description:
I can classify a piece of music in
respect to time period, region,
or culture.

5F5A54E0E153455797AABDD0AEB50A56.description:
I can identify the historical and cultural
relationships between music and
other disciplines.

A8D1D5CF932648A0946BA5954F767F6C.description:
I can evaluate connections between
musical works and other art forms
and contexts.

18CCF9664E124B39B73BEBCC4E5546CF.description:
I can identify connections between
musical works and other art forms
and contexts.

4B860946806442EF9ABD14993EDEC014.description:
Relate: Students will relate artistic ideas and works with societal, cultural, and historical context
to deepen understanding.

2816B8D4F6FE45048560F1453C64C46A.description:
I can defend my interpretation of
a musical work that conveys the
composer’s intent.

79DEDDD37A9F4F3AB38E336CCE3EAACB.description:
I can evaluate the quality of a
musical performance using personal
knowledge, skills, and experiences that
convey the composer’s intent.

EE5BE1CD3C594B2595250FC1D59D6D71.description:
I can connect personal knowledge,
skills, and experiences to
musical performances.

959E7C764270444B972655049A00B121.description:
I can explain how personal
experiences, knowledge, and skills
influence musical performances.

B6C267C4DB884AC6984056F4CCD129F2.description: Synthesize: Students will synthesize and relate knowledge and personal experiences to make art.

25DC3E1D58FC4A8D80ADB264C31FEC53.description:
I can evaluate works and performances
based on research, as well as
personally and collaboratively
developed criteria, including analysis
and interpretation of the structure
and context.

19914052FCEB4EF1A885E8FF9D5A2092.description:
I can evaluate works and performances
based on personally or collaboratively
developed criteria, including analysis
of the structure and context.

DF6EB23F0ADD4DF5B782E28C3E34A34A.description:
I can establish personally developed
criteria to evaluate musical selections
based on experiences, analysis, and
the context of a musical work.

81349BAFF89B4A45B35CC3139B612A9E.description:
I can establish collaboratively
generated criteria to evaluate
musical selections.

D7D2987E3ADD409DA66A87AB137C78BB.description: Evaluate: Students will apply criteria to evaluate artistic work.

5FE2FBD41E9940BC89E05B38D913DF7F.description:
I can support interpretations of the
expressive intent and meaning of
musical works citing as evidence the
treatment of the elements of music,
contexts, setting of the text, and varied
researched sources.

B74AB40164ED4365B701780C6B582598.description:
I can develop criteria to use when
analyzing music, based on elements of
music, interests, purpose, and context.

A784BFA1AE0747D582F3F3D7631DD029.description:
I can analyze elements of music,
interests, purpose, and context
in a selected work.

EAB3E752B9EA4B6890DAFB14DADD4CDD.description:
I can identify elements of music,
interests, purpose, and context
in a selected work.

14825674C58D473AA7D91E766ECCA6B0.description: Interpret: Students will interpret intent and meaning in artistic work.

8FA380B7B97941C8A22A3C89DC926206.description:
I can use research and provided
criteria to justify choices made when
selecting music by citing knowledge
of the music and the specified
purpose and context.

A2B5B11D3FCB4577A04615F927FEBA21.description:
I can use provided criteria to justify
choices made when selecting music.

74B8174B76C44492A932DA29F9BDC5BA.description:
I can explain reasons for selecting
music, citing characteristics of
the music and connections to
interest, purpose, and context.

A08CD7C1A8A645339C97ED4AECFA74B5.description:
I can identify reasons for selecting
music based on personal interest
and characteristics of the music.

8BF2455280D64AEF86E057E000E8BBCA.description: Select and Analyze: Students will convey meaning through the presentation of artistic work.

9EEC2AAD798E43C4A92C8FFBB687C7C2.description:
I can exhibit proper etiquette
in rehearsal, performance,
and audience settings.

293FDF000E654B6189B7FAC38CEAA321.description:
I can demonstrate mastery of the
technical demands and expressive
elements across a varied repertoire
of complex music, representing
diverse cultures and styles and using
correct technique while relating
to particular audiences.

FFC978F072FC4B31AC99DAAD6844A161.description:
I can exhibit proper etiquette
in rehearsal, performance,
and audience settings.

812412BC1E1446EA9A4D73D1B92558C5.description:
I can demonstrate consistent attention
to technical accuracy and expressive
elements in performance across
a varied repertoire of increasingly
complex music, representing
diverse cultures and styles, using
correct technique while relating
to particular audiences.

F4FE067B701D49B7A9DF181B33BDC989.description:
I can exhibit proper etiquette
in rehearsal, performance,
and audience settings.

ED425B1DBAFC4F59BCB1657FFE57E53C.description:
I can demonstrate attention to
technical accuracy and expressive
elements in performance across
a varied repertoire of music,
using correct technique.

D23D830ED4B34DC59C9A83BC314DDEDA.description:
I can exhibit proper etiquette
in rehearsal, performance,
and audience settings.

A8BF2B974E784589946952051FA8D291.description:
I can play expressively with attention
to dynamics, phrasing, and articulation,
using correct technique.

C90D92AA0B6940EAA970E27509BD186C.description: Present: Students will convey meaning through the presentation of artistic work.

A0ECE94DA1E54D3C8BED1B90214D22A7.description:
I can develop and apply criteria,
including feedback from multiple
sources, to critique varied programs
of music repertoire selected
for individual and small group
performance, and create rehearsal
strategies to address performance
challenges and refine techniques.

E4395BEDEFE34C5DAA08D3FCA554C159.description:
I can develop and apply criteria
to critique individual and small
group performances of a varied
repertoire of music in a variety of
styles, and create rehearsal strategies
to address performance challenges
and refine techniques.

36B6BD946FBE4381BF0C68553D3AA44C.description:
I can apply teacher-provided
criteria to critique individual and
small group performances of a varied
repertoire of music in a variety of
patterns and apply rehearsal strategies
to address performance challenges
and refine techniques.

09169DD7D91F42D4BD971E679B1625EF.description:
I can apply teacher-provided
criteria to critique individual
performances of a varied repertoire
of music and apply practice strategies
to address performance challenges
and refine techniques.

F3017294C53B44F19F0C64715A178BA1.description: Rehearse and Refine: Students will refine proper technique.

B455E52BBA0F4E79BCC169F2227D1973.description:
I can read and/or sight read,
alone and with others, increasingly
advanced music notation based on
appropriate time signatures, key
signatures, symbols, terminology
in various languages, and
non-traditional notation.

512439A660B54BFDBE6160B2CA485751.description:
I can read and/or sight read, alone
and with others, advanced music
notation based on appropriate time
signatures, key signatures, symbols,
and terminology in various languages.

8C50F0EDB5294F898DE02E4AB0A46E2F.description:
I can read and/or sight read alone
and with others, increasingly complex
music notation based on appropriate
time signatures, key signatures,
symbols, and terminology

DC01D1D1DDD94744B3476B1274C1EDE1.description:
I can read and play, alone and with
others, basic music notation based on
appropriate time signatures.

F7F001A72AEB44109CDBB21D4066723B.description: Read: Students will read music notation.

F4877426CEE64900B1B5143662021CB8.description: Students will develop and refine artistic techniques and work for presentation.

F1319E6FEB0542088569ACBFCC625157.description:
I can analyze, document, and
demonstrate the manner in which a
composer employs the elements of
music and context to interpret the
composer’s intent for performance.

9F6622C5D09F480B86B686B51BB0C3D0.description:
I can demonstrate understanding
and application of expressive
qualities in a varied repertoire of
music through performance.

97DF0FDC0AFD43E1ADCFD0298659E8D9.description:
I can identify and interpret, with
guidance, expressive elements
in a varied repertoire of music in
preparation for performance.

EBCAD7BD40B94128AD7832F3AFC8D865.description:
I can identify, with guidance,
the elements of music and their
purpose within a musical work.

3C9E5892D1D74372BCAB0CE5FDF70FC0.description: Interpret: Students will interpret musical works based on elements of music and expressive qualities.

4C9626A3211247B3B00A2E8F34A6BBD6.description:
I can develop and apply criteria to
select a varied repertoire to study and
perform based on an understanding
of theoretical and structural
characteristics and expressive
challenges in the music, the technical
skill of the individual or ensemble,
and the purpose and context
of the performance.

6A7981E7CD1041B8BAA6EE27CDBA8968.description:
I can explain the manner in which
self-selected music addresses the
music-reading skill and technical skill
for a potential performance.

715A05C2153742619917EADB947D4B92.description:
I can select, with limited guidance,
varied repertoire based on interest,
music-reading skills, and technical skill
for a potential performance.

E62AA356788D441EAE3A11AA77D0A16C.description:
I can select, with guidance,
passages, excerpts, or sections of
a musical work, based on interest,
music-reading skill, and technical
skill for a potential performance.

7F7BE385B86C41B4BED339D785EAB492.description: Select: Students will select musical works to present based on interest, knowledge, technical skills, and context.

DA35895B5D504BDB8538E49B3F89E0D3.description: Students will select, analyze, and interpret artistic work for presentation.

D0BCD9A74AE348E1BB62CD09FB329245.description:
I can share final versions of melodic,
rhythmic, and harmonic ideas
for a collection of compositions,
improvisations in several different
styles, and stylistically appropriate
harmonization for given melodies.

4AB33D609E3F4E5683E3AC154E95961A.description:
I can share final versions of melodic,
rhythmic, and harmonic ideas for
improvisations, compositions, and
three-or-more-chord accompaniments
in a variety of patterns.

5E7BBB34B3F54B36A19914D8C5F93E93.description:
I can share final versions of
melodic, rhythmic, and harmonic
ideas for melodies over specified
chord progressions.

C161C2E933534B158DA9B3550DFF64F2.description:
I can share final versions of simple
melodic, rhythmic, and harmonic
ideas for simple melodies.

30CBBF58B6E34B698C3F693192FD4323.description: Share: Students will share creative musical work that conveys intent, demonstrates artistry, and exhibits originality.

BBB08DFD633A4E5DA8987FD900DED490.description:
I can develop and apply criteria to
critique and refine melodic, rhythmic,
and harmonic ideas for a collection
of compositions, improvisations
in several different styles,
and stylistically appropriate
harmonization for given melodies.

A286D0E9A5FA43379790A400F135961B.description:
I can develop and apply criteria
to critique and refine melodic,
rhythmic, and harmonic ideas for
improvisations, compositions, and
three-or-more-chord accompaniments
in a variety of patterns.

9186355B3F014CB3A543A5C05CE117A2.description:
I can apply teacher-provided
criteria to critique and refine drafts
of melodic, rhythmic, and harmonic
ideas for melodies over specified
chord progressions.

F3AD6AD16E1D43D4A0C07CE462272F71.description:
I can apply teacher-provided criteria
to critique and refine drafts of simple
melodic, rhythmic, and harmonic
ideas for simple melodies.

EF4E1139B3D941BF9861527F0BFC5DD6.description: Evaluate and Refine: Students will evaluate and refine selected musical ideas to create musical CR.3.1 work that meets appropriate criteria.

1773C9ED8C8E4FBABCB4817C583D2F22.description: Students will select, analyze, and interpret artistic work for presentation.

E395785BD21F48F5B2A741308D457C27.description:
I can document melodic, rhythmic,
and harmonic ideas for a collection
of compositions, improvisations in
several different styles, and stylistically
appropriate harmonization for
given melodies.

D776A92DDDD743F4B38B842F690E9E2E.description:
I can document melodic,
rhythmic, and harmonic ideas for
improvisations, compositions, and
three-or-more-chord accompaniments
in a variety of patterns.

63A938E079DC40989452DE6BFA301CCF.description:
I can document drafts of melodic,
rhythmic, and harmonic ideas for
melodies over specified
chord progressions.

0D21D0BFAEA945C3BB4DBA4EE9A7F20D.description:
I can document drafts of simple
melodic, rhythmic, and harmonic
ideas for simple melodies.

CF1E8D854D1D424EB3ADA721A311026C.description: Plan and Make: Students will refine and complete artistic work.

1C71951A243D4055B8EF9B9DC57E1328.description:
I can generate melodic, rhythmic,
and harmonic ideas for a collection
of compositions, improvisations
in several different styles,
and stylistically appropriate
harmonization for given melodies.

608D338BB2B441BFB1F0BF29E6F08C61.description:
I can generate melodic,
rhythmic, and harmonic ideas for
improvisations, compositions,
and three-or-more-chord
accompaniments in a
variety of patterns.

D1EB0FE0848C4F7CA6F498D2E4797C34.description:
I can generate melodic, rhythmic,
and harmonic ideas for melodies over
specified chord progressions.

E130C8C769F245C58B1F4D02420CA890.description:
I can generate melodic,
rhythmic, and harmonic ideas
for simple melodies.

A008808B57FF4F3898E4BBD25B74022E.description: Imagine: Students will generate and conceptualize artistic ideas and work.
